record.title: PRESERVATION APPROVAL PROCESS IMPROVEMENT ACT OF 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of Calendar No. 151, H.R. 1675.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read a third time and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, with no intervening action or debate, and that any statements relating to the bill be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
